data.taskTitle: Add delete confirmation for projects in ProjectEditor
Add delete confirmation for projects in ProjectEditor
data.approach: Add a Delete Project button in the footer when editing (not creating), with a confirmation dialog before calling DELETE /api/projects/[name]

data.taskTitle: Add delete confirmation for projects in ProjectEditor
summary: Added onDelete callback prop to ProjectEditor component
Added delete confirmation state management (showDeleteConfirm, isDeleting, deleteError)
Added Delete button in footer (only shown in edit mode, not create mode)
Added confirmation modal with warning icon, project name, and note about only removing from config
Added handleDelete function that calls DELETE /api/projects endpoint
Implemented escape key handling for confirmation modal
Reset delete state when drawer opens/closes

filesModified.description: Added delete button with confirmation dialog for existing projects

reviewFocus: Verify delete button only appears in edit mode (not when creating new project)
Check confirmation modal displays project key correctly
Ensure DELETE API is called with correct project name

summary: Added Delete button in footer (edit mode only)
Added confirmation modal with warning icon
Added proper z-index layering and Escape key handling
Added loading state and error handling
